critique: The document expresses concern about high prescription drug costs and outlines actions taken and planned to address this issue. The President aims to convey a sense of hope and determination to lower drug costs for Americans. The primary emotions conveyed are concern (which can be interpreted as a mild form of sadness/disgust regarding the current situation) and hope/determination (a form of joy) that the situation can be improved. There's a mild element of surprise that costs are so high compared to other countries. There isn't a strong indication of fear or anger.
